front.title: IPv4+ The Extended Protocol Based On IPv4(v1)

abstract.t: This document specifies version 4+ of the Internet Protocol (IPv4+). IPv4 is very successful,Simple and beautiful. continuation and expansion of the IPv4 is necessary. Existing systems, devices only need to upgrade the software to support IPv4+, without the need to update new hardwares,saving investment costs. Ipv4+ is also an interstellar Protocol, so the Internet will evolve into a star Internet.
